methodology.title: SHERLOCK METHODOLOGY
methodology.subtitle: The science behind your style analysis
methodology.quote: We don't apply trends; we decode biology through the lens of Seoul's aesthetic elite.
methodology.description: The Sherlock Methodology is K-MIRROR's proprietary facial analysis framework. It digitizes the intuition of world-class celebrity directors into a millimetric precision engine.
methodology.identityQuote: Your identity is the constant. Seoul is the variable.
methodology.bridgeDesc: K-MIRROR removes the barrier of entry to the world's most sophisticated beauty standards. Our AI translates professional artistry into a personalized protocol for every face, every tone, and every identity on Earth.
methodology.pillar1Desc: Our neural engine moves beyond archaic 'face shape' classifications. By segmenting the face into three distinct horizontal sectors—Upper, Middle, and Lower—Sherlock identifies the specific millimetric deviations from the iconic K-Idol balance. This allows for a precision-engineered approach to volume and contour placement, creating harmony where there was once disparity.
methodology.pillar2Desc: We analyze the 'Canthal Tilt'—the critical angle between the inner and outer corners of the eye. Whether your anatomy dictates a 'Doe-eye' (neutral), 'Cat-eye' (positive), or 'Puppy-eye' (negative) vector, Sherlock adapts high-fashion K-eyeliner techniques to enhance your natural gaze. We don't hide your ethnicity; we accentuate its most powerful visual vectors.
methodology.pillar3Desc: True K-Beauty elegance is built on the bone. Sherlock identifies the prominence of the zygomatic arch and the mandible to determine your 'Structural Signature.' This dictates whether a 'Soft-Focus' dewy look or a 'Sculpted-Matte' editorial finish will better serve your unique skeletal architecture, ensuring your transformation looks flawless in high-intensity lighting.

consent.biometricBody: K-MIRROR uses AI to analyze facial features including skin tone, face shape, and bone structure. This data is processed in real-time and is not stored on our servers. By proceeding, you consent to this one-time biometric analysis.
consent.biometricLearnMore: Read our Privacy Policy for full details.
consent.cookieMessage: We use essential cookies to keep the app running. Analytics cookies help us improve your experience.

sherlock.biometricDesc: Advanced canthal tilt and orbital vector analysis adapts elite K-eyeliner techniques to your gaze
sherlock.spectralDesc: Osteo-structural mapping determines your skeletal signature for dewy or sculpted finishes

howItWorks.title: Three Steps to Your K-Beauty Protocol
howItWorks.subtitle: From selfie to personalized beauty routine in under 60 seconds
howItWorks.step1Desc: Take or upload a bare-face photo. Our AI needs zero makeup for optimal analysis.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Sherlock Engine maps 68 facial landmarks against K-Beauty's golden ratios and your skin spectral data.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Receive a personalized beauty protocol with product matches, tutorials, and celeb-inspired looks.

reviews.review1Text: Finally, K-Beauty advice that actually works for my skin tone. The AI analysis was scarily accurate.
reviews.review2Text: I've been following K-Beauty for years but never found products for darker skin. K-MIRROR changed that completely.
reviews.review3Text: The celeb matching feature is addictive. Found my perfect makeup routine through my Jennie match.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How accurate is the AI analysis?
faq.a1: Our Sherlock Engine analyzes 68 facial landmarks with 97.3% accuracy, benchmarked against professional beauty directors. Results improve with clear, well-lit photos.
faq.q2: Does it work for all skin tones?
faq.a2: Absolutely. K-MIRROR's Inclusion Guard™ ensures algorithms are trained across every melanin level and ethnicity. Your skin tone is the foundation, not a limitation.
faq.a3: No. All facial analysis is processed in real-time and immediately discarded. We never store biometric data on our servers. Read our Privacy Policy for details.
faq.q4: How is this different from other beauty apps?
faq.a4: K-MIRROR is the only platform that combines millimetric facial mapping with Seoul's professional beauty standards, adapted for every ethnicity. It's not a filter — it's a diagnostic tool.
